question: Which state government recently decided to withdraw Intercaste and Interfaith Marriage Incentive Scheme?
explanation: The Intercaste and Interfaith Marriage Incentive Scheme was commenced by the national integration department of Uttar Pradesh back in 1976 to motivate intercaste and interfaith marriages. After introducing the law against 'Love-Jihad',Uttar Pradesh government planned to withdraw this scheme. Now,interfaith couples would not get the incentive money.
